00005 #ifndef EXAMPLES_TUMBLER_CUBE_H_
00006 #define EXAMPLES_TUMBLER_CUBE_H_
00007 
00008 #include <GLES2/gl2.h>
00009 
00010 #include "examples/tumbler/basic_macros.h"
00011 
00012 namespace tumbler {
00013 
00014 // The Cube class provides a place to implement 3D rendering.  It has a
00015 // frame that it occupies in a browser window.
00016 class Cube {
00017  public:
00018   Cube();
00019   ~Cube();
00020 
00021   // Called once when a new RenderContext is first bound to the view.  The
00022   // bound context is guaranteed to be current and valid before calling this
00023   // method.
00024   void PrepareOpenGL();
00025 
00026   // Called whenever the size of the browser view changes.  This method is
00027   // called at least once when the view is first made visible.  Clamps the
00028   // sizes to 1.
00029   void Resize(int width, int height);
00030 
00031   // Called every time the view need to be drawn.  The bound context is
00032   // guaranteed to be current and valid before this method is called.  The
00033   // visible portion of the context is flushed to the browser after this
00034   // method returns.
00035   void Draw();
00036 
00037   // Accessor for width and height.  To change these, call Resize.
00038   const int width() const {
00039     return width_;
00040   }
00041 
00042   const int height() const {
00043     return height_;
00044   }
00045 
00046   // Accessor/mutator for the camera orientation.
00047   void GetOrientation(float* orientation) const {
00048     orientation[0] = static_cast<float>(orientation_[0]);
00049     orientation[1] = static_cast<float>(orientation_[1]);
00050     orientation[2] = static_cast<float>(orientation_[2]);
00051     orientation[3] = static_cast<float>(orientation_[3]);
00052   }
00053   void SetOrientation(const float* orientation) {
00054     orientation_[0] = static_cast<GLfloat>(orientation[0]);
00055     orientation_[1] = static_cast<GLfloat>(orientation[1]);
00056     orientation_[2] = static_cast<GLfloat>(orientation[2]);
00057     orientation_[3] = static_cast<GLfloat>(orientation[3]);
00058   }
00059 
00060  private:
00061   // Create the shaders used to draw the cube, and link them into a program.
00062   // Initializes |shader_progam_object_|, |position_loction_| and
00063   // |mvp_location_|.
00064   bool CreateShaders();
00065 
00066   // Generates a cube as a series of GL_TRIANGLE_STRIPs, and initializes
00067   // |index_count_| to the number of indices in the index list used as a VBO.
00068   // Creates the |vbo_ids_| required for the vertex and index data and uploads
00069   // the the VBO data.
00070   void CreateCube();
00071 
00072   // Build up the model-view transform from the eye and orienation properties.
00073   // Assumes that |model_view| is a 4x4 matrix.
00074   void ComputeModelViewTransform(GLfloat* model_view);
00075 
00076   int width_;
00077   int height_;
00078   GLuint shader_program_object_;  // The compiled shaders.
00079   GLint position_location_;  // The position attribute location.
00080   GLint color_location_;  // The color attribute location.
00081   GLint mvp_location_;  // The Model-View-Projection composite matrix.
00082   GLuint cube_vbos_[3];
00083   GLfloat eye_[3];  // The eye point of the virtual camera.
00084   // The orientation of the virtual camera stored as a quaternion.  The
00085   // quaternion is laid out as {{x, y, z}, w}.
00086   GLfloat orientation_[4];
00087   GLfloat perspective_proj_[16];
00088   GLfloat mvp_matrix_[16];
00089 
00090   DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(Cube);
00091 };
00092 
00093 }  // namespace tumbler
00094 
00095 #endif  // EXAMPLES_TUMBLER_CUBE_H_
